籤詩版本二:
Mentingji akusangalala kwambiri, ndipo khomo la ntchito zabwino ndi lotukuka.
Zinthu zonse zimayenda bwino m'munda waukwati, ndipo matenda akakumana ndi mankhwala odabwitsa, mudzakhala bwino
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira maloto a masika okhala ndi maluwa mazana ambiri.
Chilichonse chimakhala chabwino mukakumana ndi munthu wolemekezeka.

(Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro cha chikondwerero chosangalatsa.
Zonse zikuyenda bwino.
)
解曰: Masika ndi akuya ndipo dzuwa ndi lofunda. Maluwa amamasula okha. Osazengereza. Kuwonekera kwa anthu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Tsiku lobadwa la Guo Fenyang
Guo Ziyi, wamkulu wamkulu wa Tang Dynasty ndi Mfumu ya Fenyang, adachita phwando lobadwa. Achibale ndi mabwenzi anabwera kudzayamikira, ndipo mkhalidwewo unali wodzaza ndi chisangalalo ndi chisangalalo.
聖意: Banja likuyenda bwino, mwiniwake amakhala wotetezeka, chuma chikuyenda bwino, bizinesi ikuyenda bwino, banja likuyenda bwino, Liujia amaletsa zodabwitsa, oyenda pansi amapita kumunda, mphutsi za silika zimalemera, ziweto zimalemera, anthu apezeka, milandu. wapambana, kusamuka kumayenda bwino, katundu wotayika amafunidwa mwachangu, matenda ndi Anshan, manda ndi abwino,
第X籤: Makumi asanu ndi limodzi mphambu zisanu ndi zitatu, Kupambana Lottery (Lottery)
